title: RFHW Design engineer, Cellular
summary: The In-region RF Hardware Design Engineer will work on the next generation iPhone and other innovative products. You will be part of the RF Design team, acting as the team’s local technical expert at manufacturing sites in India.
description:
You will be working with other Wireless teams and colleagues to build, validate and optimize Cellular RF systems from first prototype build to mass production, requiring proactive cross-functional collaboration with other engineering groups such as antenna design, production test, reliability, software engineering etc.

Experience with wireless system integration into consumer products is required, Cellular RF experience is a plus.

International and domestic travel is likely.
key_qualifications:
Fluency in wireless communications standards and wireless transceiver system integration
Very strong RF fundamentals incl. RF component and RF system level knowledge
Master Smith Chart & RF matching
Hands on experience with RF test equipment (Call box, Vector network analyzer, Spectrum analyzer, Signal generator, Oscilloscope, etc.)
Experience working with manufacturing an advantage
Should be well-organized and can be flexible in a changing work environment.
Strong communication skills required
Cellular system experience preferred
Python scripting experience is a plus
education_experience:
- Bachelors in Electrical & Electronics Engineering/ Communications Engineering or similar (Masters preferred)
- 5+ years of relevant industry experience
